name: Babs and Fabs
description:
Bab's And Fab's is a game made by 2 students for the game maker's toolkit gamejam in 48H the subject was : "Only One" so we decided to make a game with only one enemy. This same enemy revives every time you kill him and with a counter to how you killed him before. It's up to you to discover how to beat him every time he respawns. 

CONTROLS :
A and D for left and right (also left and right arrow)
Space for jump
E for interacting with stuff.

S to slide.

Shift for the sword

Thanks for downloading this game and have fun playing it!
